response.overview: Todd's dream is to turn on the Christmas lights in his home town of Hollywood, Belfast - but there's just one hitch - he's by no means famous enough. The solution is obviously to make the trip to Hollywood USA, become a big star, and return in a blaze of triumphant Christmassy glory. Enjoy understated irony in this story featuring a classic British underdog...will Todd's big adventure pay off?
response.title: Shane Todd: Holywood to Hollwood
